forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies early, followed by partial clearing. High 16C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High near 60F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 11C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low 51F. NW winds shifting to SSE at 10 to 15 mph.
